item.title: Autofighter v1.0 and v0.5
item.dc:creator: @junkj junkj
item.description:
@junkj wrote:

hey people,Its junkj.
My best script yet with anti-randoms and antibans for the v1.0 and your original autofighter v0.5.
No proggys yet these dam runtime errors…but it compiles good.
Both with awsome sweet Srl eating and find and attack monsters. <3 SRL
need SRL? dowload it here=villu-reborn.com

|~Release information~|
v0.5 origianal autofighter
v1.0 anti-ban and randoms
v1.5 bone collecter and burrier
v2.0 (final) AWSOME srl with prayer,arrow,magic fighting things
|~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~|

setup the set up and username and pass

v5.0=

{     ~~~~~~~    ~~~~~           ~~~~~    ~~                     ~~~      ~~~
~~~~~~_______~~~~_____~~~~~~~~~~~_____~~~~__~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~___~~~~~~___~~~
 J  //jjjjjjj|  ||uuuu| J       ||uuuu| J||n|                   ||kk|    //kk/

{<^%$@*$%$@%$@^#%&^%&%-!=$*JUNKY PRODUCTIONS*$=-!#^$&%*&^*$!#@$*$&%^&$%$#@$#%@>}
{____________________________________READ!______________________________________
//\\{Must be in v-bright!
\\// Must be higher then the monsters level
//\\ Must Setup manually! no automatics!
\\// Enter user and password                       (MUST HAVE SRL TO WORK)
//\\ Post bugs and bad stuff
\\// Release dates will be posted
____________________________________Features!___________________________________
//\\Some Antiban things                       .5v=awsome srl atacking.
\\//Awsome releases                           1.v=better antirandoms.
//\\Autochat                                  More realeses soon
\\//Coin picker                                    \/
//\\Decent proggy                                  () \_/
\\//A good srl eating procedure, for the greedy    \____/
________________________________________________________________________________
_______________Set up the following...=setup ,user pass and nick________________
-------------------------------HAVE-FUN-----------------------------------------
_______________________________________________________________________________}
program fighter;
{.include srl/srl.scar}
{.include srl/srl/skill/Fighting.scar}

var
killed :integer;
/////////////////////////////////////////////////
const           {VV setup VV}                  //
hpeat=10;                                      //hp to eat at
foodcolor1=0;                                  //color of food
coincolor=0;                                   //color of coin
mname=('goblin');                              //name of monster
monstercolor1=0;                               //color of monster
monstercolor2=0;                               //second color of monster
monstercolor3=0;                               //third color of monster
Timebetweenkill=0;                             //time between each kill
howmanytokill=1;                               //how many you want to kill
name=('name');                                 //player name here
/////////////////////////////////////////////////

procedure DeclarePlayers;
 Begin                         {dont touch this!}
    HowManyPlayers := 1;
    NumberOfPlayers(HowManyPlayers);    // Sets the Players Array Length;
    CurrentPlayer := 0;                 // CurrentPlayer = Array Index
                             {just touch this!}
    Players[0].Name := '';        //Username
    Players[0].Pass := '';           //Password
    Players[0].Nick := '';             //3 or 4 letters username
    Players[0].Loc := '';                  //Dont touch this
    Players[0].Active := True;
end;

procedure pickcoin;
begin
if(findcolorspiraltolerance(x,y,coincolor,MSX1,MSY1,MSX2,MSY2,25))then
Mmouse(x,y,3,3)
if(IsUpTextMulti('take','coins','ke co'))then
begin
Writeln('found coins,now going to pick them up');
mouse(x,y,0,0,true)
Findnormalrandoms;
end;
end;

procedure MortalDraw;
begin
Loginplayer;
findnormalrandoms;
realeatifneeded(foodcolor1,hpeat,true)
if findmonster(monstercolor1,monstercolor2,monstercolor3,25,mname)then
mmouse(x,y,3,3)
Attackmonster(monstercolor1,monstercolor2,monstercolor3,mname,25)
    Begin
    Getmousepos(x,y)
  Mouse(x,y,0,0,True);
  RandomMovement;
  killed:=killed+1
  ftWait(Timebetweenkill)
  pickcoin;
end;
end;


procedure proggy;
begin
Writeln('<><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><>');
Writeln('killed ' + inttostr(killed) + 'monsters');
Writeln('Working for ' + (timerunning));
Writeln('Report anything bad or some bug or proggys');
Writeln('BANNED ACOUNTS ARE ABSOLUTLEY NOT MY PROBLEM!');
Writeln('<><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><>');
end;

procedure hello;
begin
if inchat('hello')or
   inchat('hi')or
   inchat('hey')or
   inchat('yo')or
   inchat(name)then
   typesend('hey')
end;

procedure whatsup;
begin
if inchat('whats up')or
   inchat('whats new')or
   inchat('whats the 411')then
   typesend('nothing')
end;

procedure friends;
begin
if inchat('friends')or
   inchat('frends')or
   inchat('buddys')or
   inchat('add')or
   inchat('add me')then
   typesend('sorry,got lots of them')
end;


   
procedure proggyintro;
begin
Writeln('                                                               ');
Writeln('          _|^^|__________________________|^|______             ');
Writeln('          | |-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+|+-+-+- |___|_________    ');
Writeln('          |_|________________________|_______|___|             ');
Writeln('           || //       ||/////|\\   \     __| |_               ');
Writeln('           ||//        ||/////| \\_ /    |___*__|)-----------* ');
Writeln('           || |        ||/////|\___/     |______|              ');
Writeln('           || |        ||/////|                                ');
Writeln('           ||_|        ||_____|                                ');
Writeln('                       || * |                                  ');
Writeln('                       || * |                                  ');
Writeln('                       || * |                                  ');
Writeln('                       ||___|                                  ');
Writeln('     Post or pm any progress,errors or bug about this          ');
Writeln('         This is my 1337357 (leetest) script ever              ');
Writeln('If something goes wrong then pm the error or look at the set up');
end;

procedure deadproggy;
begin
if (wearedead) then
proggy;
end;

begin
activateclient;
setupsrl;
cleardebug;
proggyintro;
repeat
If not(loggedin) then break;
whatsup;
friends;
hello;
pickcoin;
Findnormalrandoms;
MortalDraw;
until(killed = howmanytokill)
if(killed = howmanytokill) then
begin
proggy;
logout;
TerminateScript;
end;
end.

v1.0

{<^%$@$%$@%$@^#%&^%&%-!=$JUNKY PRODUCTIONS$=-!#^$&%&^$!#@$$&%^&$%$#@$#%@>}
{READ!__
//\{Must be in v-bright!
\// Must be higher then the monsters level
//\ Must Setup manually! no automatics!
\// Enter user and password (MUST HAVE SRL TO WORK)
//\ Post bugs and bad stuff
\// Release dates will be posted
_Features!
//\Some Antiban things .5v=awsome srl atacking.
\//Awsome releases 1.v=better antirandoms.
//\Autochat More realeses soon
\//Coin picker /

Set up the following…=setup ,user pass and nick_
-------------------------------HAVE-FUN-----------------------------------------
_______________________________________________________________________________}
program fighter;
{.include srl/srl.scar}
{.include srl/srl/skill/Fighting.scar}

var
killed :integer;
/////////////////////////////////////////////////
const {VV setup VV} //
str=(‘5’); //str lvl
att=(‘5’); //att lvl
def=(‘5’); //def lvl
hpeat=3; //hp to eat at
foodcolor1=1340587; //color of food
coincolor=1347761; //color of coin
mname=(‘goblin’); //name of monster
monstercolor1=875376; //color of monster
monstercolor2=2529417; //second color of monster
monstercolor3=7500411; //third color of monster
Timebetweenkill=15000; //time between each kill
howmanytokill=5; //how many you want to kill
name=(‘13r0wn 51u5h’); //player name here
/////////////////////////////////////////////////

procedure DeclarePlayers;
Begin {dont touch this!}
HowManyPlayers := 1;
NumberOfPlayers(HowManyPlayers); // Sets the Players Array Length;
CurrentPlayer := 0; // CeurrentPlayer = Array Index
{just touch this!}
Players[0].Name := ‘13r0wn_51u5h’; //Username
Players[0].Pass := ‘brownies’; //Password
Players[0].Nick := ‘13r0’; //3 or 4 letters username
Players[0].Loc := ‘’; //Dont touch this
Players[0].Active := True;
end;

procedure login;
begin
loginplayer;
end;

procedure pickcoin;
begin
if(findcolorspiraltolerance(x,y,coincolor,MSX1,MSY1,MSX2,MSY2,25))then
Mmouse(x,y,3,3)
if(IsUpTextMulti(‘take’,‘coins’,‘ke co’))then
begin
Writeln(‘found coins,now going to pick them up’);
mouse(x,y,0,0,true)
Findnormalrandoms;
end;
end;

procedure MortalDraw;
begin
findnormalrandoms;
realeatifneeded(foodcolor1,hpeat,true)
if findmonster(monstercolor1,monstercolor2,monstercolor3,25,mname)then
mmouse(x,y,3,3)
Attackmonster(monstercolor1,monstercolor2,monstercolor3,mname,25)
Begin
Getmousepos(x,y)
Mouse(x,y,0,0,True);
RandomMovement;
killed:=killed+1
ftWait(Timebetweenkill)
pickcoin;
end;
end;

procedure proggy;
begin
Writeln(’<><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><>’);
Writeln(‘killed ’ + inttostr(killed) + ‘monsters’);
Writeln(‘Working for ’ + (timerunning));
Writeln(‘Report anything bad or some bug or proggys’);
Writeln(‘BANNED ACOUNTS ARE ABSOLUTLEY NOT MY PROBLEM!’);
Writeln(’<><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><>’);
end;

procedure hello;
begin
if inchat(‘hello’)or
inchat(‘hi’)or
inchat(‘hey’)or
inchat(‘yo’)or
inchat(name)then
typesend(‘hey’)
end;

procedure whatsup;
begin
if inchat(‘whats up’)or
inchat(‘whats new’)or
inchat(‘whats the 411’)then
typesend(‘nothing’)
end;

procedure friends;
begin
if inchat(‘friends’)or
inchat(‘frends’)or
inchat(‘buddys’)or
inchat(‘add’)or
inchat(‘add me’)then
typesend(‘sorry,got lots of them’)
end;

procedure talklvl;
begin
if inchat(‘str lvl’)or
inchat(‘str level’)or
inchat(‘stre lvl’)or
inchat(‘strength lvl’)or
inchat(‘strength level’)then
typesend(str)

if inchat(‘att lvl’)or
inchat(‘att level’)or
inchat(‘atack lvl’)or
inchat(‘atack level’)or
inchat(‘attack lvl’)or
inchat(‘attack level’)then
typesend(att)

if inchat(‘def lvl’)or
inchat(‘def level’)or
inchat(‘defenc lvl’)or
inchat(‘defence level’)or
inchat(‘defenc level’)or
inchat(‘defence level’)then
typesend(def)
end;

procedure proggyintro;
begin
Writeln(’ ‘);
Writeln(’ |^^|________|^| ‘);
Writeln(’ | |-±±±±±±±±±±±+|±±± || ‘);
Writeln(’ ||_________________||__| ‘);
Writeln(’ || // ||/////|\ \ | | ‘);
Writeln(’ ||// ||/////| \ / |*|)-----------* ‘);
Writeln(’ || | ||/////|_/ || ‘);
Writeln(’ || | ||/////| ‘);
Writeln(’ ||| ||| ‘);
Writeln(’ || * | ‘);
Writeln(’ || * | ‘);
Writeln(’ || * | ‘);
Writeln(’ ||___| ‘);
Writeln(’ Post or pm any progress,errors or bug about this ‘);
Writeln(’ This is my 1337357 (leetest) script ever ');
Writeln(‘If something goes wrong then pm the error or look at the set up’);
end;

procedure deadproggy;
begin
if (wearedead) then
proggy;
end;

procedure hatetherandoms;
begin
FindNormalRandoms;
Wait(1000);
FindTalk;
Wait(1000);
FindDead;
Wait(1000);
FindMime;
Wait(1000);
FindMaze;
Wait(1000);
FindQuiz;
Wait(1000);
FindScapeRune;
Wait(1000);
ClickToContinue;
Wait(1000);
SolveFrog;
Wait(1000);
FindTalk;
wait(1000)
Findmod;
end;

begin
activateclient;
setupsrl;
cleardebug;
proggyintro;
repeat
login;
srlrandomsreport;
talklvl;
hatetherandoms;
whatsup;
friends;
hello;
pickcoin;
Findnormalrandoms;
MortalDraw;
until(killed = howmanytokill)
if(killed = howmanytokill) then
begin
proggy;
writeln(‘script done’);
logout;
TerminateScript;
end;
end.
[/code]
